content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=34-41, y=-83 to -87)
Complex mining setup consisting of:
- 4 Burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), (41.0,-86.0), (41.0,-83.0)
- 4 Wooden chests at positions (34.5,-86.5), (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), (40.5,-87.5)
- 2 Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Processing setup consisting of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) mining iron and copper ore
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5) collecting ore
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0) for smelting
- Burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5) and (-25.5,-58.5) for automation
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5) containing processed plates

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Mining setup with:
- 3 Burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), (-6.0,-59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
All drills currently out of fuel but positioned over iron resources

### Smelting Array at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Large smelting setup consisting of:
- 4 Stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters automating input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Power setup consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Electric pole network extending from (7.5,13.5) to (11.5,20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from chests
- Ensure the chest contains the requested item before attempting extraction
- Verify the chest position is correct and accessible
- Check if chest is not empty before attempting extraction

### Errors with fuel management
- Multiple burner mining drills are out of fuel
- Ensure fuel distribution system is in place before starting mining operations
- Set up automated coal delivery to mining drills

### Errors with chest capacity
- Chest at (-5.5,-55.5) is full, blocking further operations
- Monitor chest capacity and ensure regular emptying
- Consider adding more storage or faster item removal system
